name: Soffit/Eave Material
template name: Soffit Works - Canopy 1 Soffit Eave Install

name: 10g a2/70 stainless screw fixings into z angles
12g class 3 tek screws into frame work
Isolation tape used between gal top hat and z angles
Panel Stifferners installed at 600mm centres using approved Struc. Silicone
Additional Top Hat supports installed at 1.2m centres apart
Max. 1200mm span between top hat restarints
Droppers from purlins to facilitate max top hat spans
2 x 12g c3 tek screw at either end of dropper
Insulation Sarking installed and taped where cut
Area clean and free of debris
Inspected and accepted by S&H authorised representative as complying with relevant Australian Standard and legislation
Inspected and accepted by Authorized Representative
All items have been completed and demonstrated satisfactorily
